page.title: 08Nadine's day in Featherstone
page.content: At 7.15 I get out of bed,wake my brother up and we both get dressed then we go downstairs and put the television on then I go into the kitchen to make our breakfast,we usually have cereal and a cup of tea, we carry this into the room and eat it from our knee.At 8-30 we go upstairs to wake Mum up and get washed and brush our teeth before leaving for school.We are in school from 9-00 to 3-30.After school my brother and I go to the sweet shop on our bikes,then I call for my friends and we play with Barbie dolls or at ball.At 6-00 I have my tea,I usually have a cheese and Branston pickle sandwich and a cup of tea.I play out again until 7-30 when I have to get ready for bed before Kay comes to look after us.At 8-00 my Mum goes out and I play records with Kay before going to bed about 10-00.
